channel.title: jekyll on Mark A. Matienzo
channel.description: Recent content in jekyll on Mark A. Matienzo

item.title: My Jekyll todo list
item.description: A running list of things I want to do or have done. A lot of this relates to adopting the IndieWeb ethos DONE Enable sending and receiving webmentions DONE Minimal h-entry markup New theme! Enable incoming webmention displays from Webmention.io. Redo build process, perhaps running on Travis or my own server. Enable automatic POSSE to Twitter, Medium, Slideshare, LinkedIn, and Facebook(?). Consider using Bridgy if this will lower friction. Send automatic webmentions through Webmention.
